title: Punjab Cabinet swearing-in Live Updates: Uprooting corruption, tackling drug addiction — newly-inducted Ministers set targets - The Indian Express
content:
1. Punjab Cabinet swearing-in Live Updates: Uprooting corruption, tackling drug addiction — newly-inducted Ministers set targets  The Indian Express
  2. Punjab CM Mann names his ministers, Cheema among 10 to take oath on Saturday before first meeting of new  Times of India
  3. Anti-graft helpline on Bhagat Singh's martyrdom day: Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann  The Tribune India
  4. In Mann’s first list of Cabinet ministers, 8 greenhorn MLAs  The Indian Express
  5. Bhagwant Mann reveals how new Punjab Cabinet will look; Lone woman, first-timers to take oath  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Punjab Cabinet swearing-in Live Updates: Former leader of opposition Harpal Singh Cheema, who is a second time MLA from Dirba, and Gurmeet Singh Meet Hayer, who won a second term from Barnala, were sworn in by the Punjab Governor.
